globalNegativeConstraints.description: This document outlines the topics and behaviors strictly prohibited in all of BILAN's social media and public posts to maintain brand integrity, avoid legal issues, and foster a positive community.

contentRestrictions.constraint: Do not make unsubstantiated health claims. Avoid promising to 'cure,' 'treat,' or 'prevent' any disease. All statements about health benefits must be supported by scientific evidence and include appropriate disclaimers.

Do not provide medical advice. Always recommend consulting with a healthcare professional for personal health concerns. Do not violate advertising standards (e.g., FTC guidelines) regarding endorsements and testimonials.
examples_to_avoid: If you have XYZ symptoms, you should take BILAN.
Skip the doctor, just drink our electrolytes.

contentRestrictions.constraint: Avoid negativity, fear-mongering, or shaming. Do not engage in arguments or hostile interactions with users. Maintain a positive, empowering, and supportive tone. Do not make direct, unsubstantiated negative comparisons to competitors.
examples_to_avoid: You're harming your body if you don't use electrolytes.
Competitor X is full of sugar and chemicals, unlike us.
Engaging in heated political or religious debates.

contentRestrictions.constraint: Do not post offensive, discriminatory, or explicit content. This includes hate speech, harassment, and inappropriate imagery. Do not share user-generated content without explicit permission and proper credit.
examples_to_avoid: Posting memes that could be considered offensive.
Using a customer's photo without asking them first.

contentRestrictions.constraint: Do not share confidential company information, internal data, or private customer information.
examples_to_avoid: Sharing a customer's order details publicly.
